title: Echoes of the Gold Rush
subTitle: 黃金歲月的迴響：瑞芳與九份垂直美學
intro: Explore the 'Asian Gold Capital'. From the industrial heritage of Jinguashi to the lantern-lit alleys of Jiufen, experience the vertical beauty of the mountain town.
transportation: **Bus 965** from Ximen/Banqiao or **Bus 1062** from Zhongxiao Fuxing.

spots.name: Gold Museum (黃金博物館)
spots.description: Enter the Benshan Fifth Tunnel to experience the miner's life. Touch the 220kg gold bar and hike to the Golden Shinto Shrine ruins.

spots.name: Jiufen Old Street (九份老街)
spots.description: Wander through the narrow alleys. Visit 'A-Mei Tea House' for the iconic view and taste taro balls while overlooking the ocean.

spots.name: Blue Hour at A-Mei Tea House (阿妹茶樓藍調時刻)
spots.description: The best time for photography. The red lanterns against the deep blue sky create a magical atmosphere.

title: Ceramics & Eastern Art
subTitle: 工藝復興與藝術新地標：鶯歌與三峽雙城記
intro: A journey of craftsmanship. Visit the new Art Museum in Yingge and the 'Temple of Eastern Art' in Sanxia. Experience indigo dyeing.

spots.name: New Taipei City Art Museum (新北市美術館)
spots.description: A new landmark with reed-inspired architecture. Explore contemporary art exhibitions and the surrounding ceramic park.

spots.name: Sanxia Zushi Temple (三峽祖師廟)
spots.description: Known as the 'Palace of Eastern Art'. Every stone pillar is hand-carved, a masterpiece supervised by artist Li Mei-shu.

spots.name: Sanxia Indigo Dyeing Center (三峽藍染中心)
spots.description: Experience the traditional craft that once made Sanxia prosperous. Create your own blue-dyed fabric souvenir.

title: Railway, Cats & Waterfalls
subTitle: 鐵道迷朝聖：平溪支線與貓村療癒之旅
intro: Ride the Pingxi Line train deep into the mountains. Visit the Cat Village, walk through ecological tunnels, and release sky lanterns.

spots.name: Sandiaoling Eco-Friendly Tunnel (三貂嶺生態友善隧道)
spots.description: A forgotten railway tunnel turned into a bike path. See bats and stalactites in this preserved ecological site. Reservation required.

spots.name: Houtong Cat Village (猴硐貓村)
spots.description: A paradise for cat lovers. Explore the coal mining history museum and interact with hundreds of friendly cats.

spots.name: Shifen Waterfall (十分瀑布)
spots.description: Known as the 'Niagara Falls of Taiwan'. The widest waterfall in Taiwan, creating rainbows on sunny days.

title: River Mouth to Ocean
subTitle: 從河口到海洋：淡水古蹟與北海岸奇觀
intro: Trace the history of northern Taiwan in Tamsui and witness the geological wonders of Yehliu carved by wind and sea.
transportation: **MRT Red Line** + **Taiwan Tourist Shuttle (Crown Northern Coast)**.

spots.name: Fort San Domingo (紅毛城)
spots.description: A 17th-century Spanish fortress later used by the Dutch and British. A symbol of Taiwan's colonial history.

spots.name: Tamsui Fisherman's Wharf (淡水漁人碼頭)
spots.description: Watch one of Taiwan's most famous sunsets from the Lover's Bridge. Enjoy 'Ah-Gei' (stuffed tofu) nearby.

spots.name: Yehliu Geopark (野柳地質公園)
spots.description: Home to the iconic 'Queen's Head' rock. Explore the surreal landscape of mushroom rocks and sea candles.

title: Golden Ridge Deep Dive
subTitle: 山海經完整篇章：東北角黃金稜線
intro: A comprehensive tour of the Ruifang ecosystem. Stay overnight in Jiufen, hike the Teapot Mountain, and see the illuminated 13-Layer Remains.

spots.name: Remains of the 13 Levels (水湳洞十三層遺址)
spots.description: Often called the 'Castle in the Sky'. An imposing industrial ruin overlooking the Yin-Yang Sea. Illuminated at night.

spots.name: Teapot Mountain Trail (無耳茶壺山步道)
spots.description: A challenging but rewarding hike. The summit offers a breathtaking panoramic view of the Pacific Ocean and the mountain towns.

spots.name: Wanggu Waterfall (望古瀑布)
spots.description: A hidden gem on the Pingxi Line. A serene waterfall pool perfect for meditation and photography, away from the crowds.

title: Tribes, Springs & City
subTitle: 原民溫泉與都市夜色：新北多樣性之旅
intro: Experience the diversity of New Taipei. From the Atayal culture in Wulai mountains to the bustling night markets of the city.

spots.name: Wulai Log Cart & Waterfall (烏來台車&瀑布)
spots.description: Ride the historic log cart to see the majestic Wulai Waterfall. Soak in the odorless 'Beauty Soup' (sodium bicarbonate spring).

spots.name: Lehua Night Market (樂華夜市)
spots.description: A local favorite. Try the 'Daddy's Taro Balls' and Thai Papaya Salad. A true taste of New Taipei's nightlife.

spots.name: Lin Family Mansion and Garden (林本源園邸)
spots.description: The most complete surviving Qing Dynasty garden in Taiwan. A testament to the wealth and lifestyle of early elites.
